review: a movie ahead of its time, both the tamil and hindi versions are worth appreciating now, when i watched them again after 15 years, excellent screenplay with novelty in story telling, that no other competitor comes near to in 2004. thank you for this(these) great film(films).

excellent movie with great content. indian youths must watch this type of movie to understand the current situation of the country. ajay devgan & vivek oberoi were treat to watch in the film. a movie worth watching especially for youths.
great movie. great performances by vevik obrey, ajay devgan and specialy abhishek bachan. hats off. what a story as well. 10/10.
